author: g11tech
content: do you mean a rolling setup with the other blockchains (that consume a setup) following that rolling setup (like till upto  `k` blocks back?) or just one time setup compute at a time, which is same as *participating in setup* where you can publish your contributing `[s^i]` which can be publically verified? just that the publishing board is now brokered by a blockchain => censorship resistance?

author: nicolas.alhaddad
content: I am talking about a rolling setup that never ends. The setup is secure as long as you have at least one honest party that deleted their s. The lengthier the trusted setup blockchain the more secure it is. Other projects, or blockchains can choose a block number that they are happy with and compute a trusted setup from the genesis block all the way to that block number.
